Room.Name: Rum Road North
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rum Road North, the main road through the island.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side you see a large red house, and from here you can the side yard. There appears to be a small building a little detached from the main structure, and you can see steps leading down toward the beach beyond the out building. Sure seems to be a good party going on inside. The road continues north with a few boarded up buildings on either side, and a newly painted shop with a sign that says, "Watch for Grand Opening." When you look closer at the sign, you realize it says this will be a magic repair shop, but the opening date was last month, and no one seems to be here.
